data.actual_result: Everytime a user switches between online and offline status, the member list jumps up and down
data.expected_result: The member list should remain static, unless the user who changes presence is visible on screen of course
data.short_description: [Lazy guilds only] Member list jumps up and down whenever someone changes presence
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a lazy guild, works with DTesters - Scroll down through member list. The further you scroll down, the more intense the effect will be - Stop scroling down, don't touch anything, and observe the member list
